mapper.sql: customer_id, customer_name, customer_identi, customer_phone, sex, email, address, password, use_type, remark1, dtflag, province, city, country
mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_id,c.customer_name,c.customer_identi,c.customer_phone,c.sex,c.email,c.address,c.use_type,c.remark1,c.dtflag,c.province,c.city,c.country,v.active_time, v.card_no FROM app_customer c JOIN app_vipcard v ON c.customer_id=v.customer_id where c.customer_phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.dtflag=0

SELECT
FROM app_customer where customer_phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND dtflag=0
mapper.delete: update app_customer set dtflag=1 where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ao.`order_id`,ao.`order_time`,airport.`airport_name`,suser.`name`,suser.`phone` FROM `app_orders` ao INNER JOIN `sys_airport` airport ON airport.`airport_id`=ao.`airport_id` INNER JOIN `sys_users` suser ON suser.`id`=ao.`id` WHERE ao.`customer_id`=#{id}

SELECT card.`card_no`,card.`valide_time`,card.`remain_money`,card.`init_money` ,ao.`pay_type`,ao.`pay_time`,ao.`activat_time` FROM `app_vipcard` card INNER JOIN `app_order_card` aoc ON card.`card_no`=aoc.`card_id` INNER JOIN `app_orders` ao ON ao.`order_id`=aoc.`card_id` WHERE ao.`customer_id`
mapper.insert: insert into app_customer (customer_id, customer_name, customer_identi, customer_phone, sex, email, address, password, use_type, remark1, dtflag, province, city, country, createTime ) values (#{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerIdenti,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE} )

insert into app_customer
customer_id,
customer_name,
customer_identi,
customer_phone,
sex,
email,
address,
password,
use_type,
remark1,
dtflag,
province,
city,
country,
createTime,

mapper.update:
update app_customer
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_identi = #{customerIdenti,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dtflag = #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
where customer_phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
